name: Hexapoda
description:
After the last human war, gases were spread through the atmosphere making it unbreathable.
The richest fled to orbital colonies and the others took refuge underground.

You are a young hothead, hired by a team of scientists left on earth who are looking for a solution to bring humans back to the surface.

Get ready to fight giant Insects for the future of humanity !
Playable from 1 to 4 players, Hexapoda is inspired by arcade classics.

- 3 game modes : Normal , Hard and Manic.
- Unlock 3 Different endings, new features and new items..
- 12 stages, 4 futuristic combat aircrafts with their own style of shooting,
- Complete the bestiary inspired by existing insects,
- Unlock all the 30 Achievements,
- Online Leaderboards for each difficulty.

Enjoy the original epic soundtrack composed by the french electronic music band Double Dragon!
